Class DeviceCodeVerificationResource

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class DeviceCodeVerificationResource
extends ConsentRequiredResource
    A restlet resource for user codes

    13.0.0
    See Also:
    OAuth 2.0 Protocol - Device Flow
